title.narrative: Safe and sustainable provision of water and WASH service to the most underserved IPDs in Dana Maaret Tamsrin sub-districts

description.narrative: To address critical gaps, emergency needs and provision of humanitarian assistance to most vulnerable in NWS, BRD in partnership with MISK plan to respond to 7298 HHs, 41668 IDPs (7499 M, 8415 W, 12686 B, 13068 ‎G and 524 PWD) Divided over: 6 camps in the Dana sub-district (Yalniz Degilsiniz 2, Khataien Ariha, Islamuna 2, Al Nahdha, Nahn Omaa and Nahn Maeaan) and 22 camps in the Maaret Tamsrin sub-district (Basment Amal, Tagammoa Alsheikh Yousef, Abna'a Al-Ezza, Al-Karkat , Al-Wifak, Sabron, AlBalat, Farjalah, Jabal Kelly, Atta alkhair3, Atta , alkhair1. Atta alkhair2, Al ainaa, Dar Alkiram, Al Baidaa, Kawkab , Kernaz, Al rahma 2, Al rahma 1, Muzun , Alfarhan(doyouf almaara) and Al rahma 3). Project interventions are designed to achieve cluster objectives by provision of emergency WASH services in high severity needs areas to prevent and address potential drought conditions, Based on BRD experience in grant management and implementing listed activities within this proposal, partnership with MISK will contribute to BRD’s capacity on a field basis where BRD will directly supervise MISK implementation of activities in addition to its role in MampE. To meet needs for large number of affected populations within multiple geographic areas, consortium decided to ensure a better-quality response relying on consortium parties' excellent WASH knowledge, experience and full access to the whole of NWS. BRD will respond to 14 camps, 3587 HHs (21385 ind) through: Maintaining, rehabilitating and expanding water network of Islamuna 2, Al Nahdha, Nahn Maeaan and Nahn Omaa camps as well as support operation costs for two stations which supply the camps with water for 7 months. Water trucking for 10 camps. Providing all mentioned camps with garbage containers and water tanks to make up for the deficiency. Garbage deportation and desludging of septic tanks in addition to the maintenance and rehabilitation of 148 latrines. MISK will respond to 14 camps and 3711 HHs (20283 ind) through: Installing hybrid systems (solar energy, fuel) within Ataa water stations and Alfarhan, as this will reduce operating expenses and support operation costs for 8 months for the two stations which provide (Jabal Kelly, Atta alkhair3, Atta , alkhair1. Atta alkhair2, Al ainaa, Dar Alkiram, Al Baidaa, Kawkab , Kernaz, Al rahma 2, Al rahma 1, Muzun , Alfarhan(doyouf almaara) and Al rahma 3) camps with water. Garbage containers will be installed and waste disposal once every 2 days for each camp will be implemented. Maintenance and rehabilitation of 170 latrines within 14 mentioned camps. BRD and MISK will conduct HP campaigns with each team in their targeted camps, through ‎a trained mobile team (M and F) focusing on personal hygiene and COVID-19 prevention, as well as considering prevention ‎measures and social distancing. Technical guidelines for the WASH Cluster in regard to Covid 19 and hygiene promotion will be applied, in addition to coordination with health cluster. BRD and MISK will ensure proper water quantity and quality are delivered to the most vulnerable people residing in camps.‎ on average 35 Lt/d/ will be provided during the summer season (Jul, Aug, Sep) as recommended by WASH Cluster, IDPs will have access up to 40 lt/p/d. To give a better response to vulnerable groups, especially PWD and children with special needs, BRD and Misk will assign Disability and Special needs officer which will be response for adjusting and tailoring all WASH related activities to meet needs of PWD and children with special needs, which in turn will be reflected in mechanism of work and implementation of project activities in proportion to the mentioned groups, by recruiting field staff (MampF) those who will be responsible for surveying and evaluating target group, in addition to following up delivery of services, adjusting activities to suit their needs, ensuring service quality and satisfaction with access to all services provided.
